title: Calloo callay, Colin’s on his way
author: VD
content_html:
Secretary of State Colin Powell and three other Cabinet members have resigned, escalating the shake-up of President Bush’s second-term team.

I’m not saying that I’m now expecting a new era of peace, sanity and a grim determination to do whatever needs to be done, but getting rid of the most overrated Secretary of State in the long, ignoble history of useless bureaucracy is never a bad thing.

If only he was taking his entire department with him. To Cuba.
content_text:
Secretary of State Colin Powell and three other Cabinet members have resigned, escalating the shake-up of President Bush’s second-term team.
I’m not saying that I’m now expecting a new era of peace, sanity and a grim determination to do whatever needs to be done, but getting rid of the most overrated Secretary of State in the long, ignoble history of useless bureaucracy is never a bad thing.
If only he was taking his entire department with him.  To Cuba.
